plusDays
The function adds the specified number of days to the specified date.
Syntax
plusDays
(date, count)
Setting
Purpose
date
The date to which the specified number of days should be added.
The date can be specified as an
attribute
, a
variable
or an
algorithm
.
count
Number of days to add to the specified date.
Note
The function is added by manual input.
Subtraction is done by passing a negative value to the "count" parameter.
Use example
For example, to set up a newsletter about a promotion, it is required to prepare a
template
of the message to be sent, in which the coupon expiration date will be counted from the current date.

plusDays
